title: GetBACnetDoubleProperty (Method)
text:
METHOD GetBACnetDoubleProperty : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_DOUBLE
Returns the BACnet-Double-Value of the specified Property (propID) of this BACnet-Object as a DOUBLE. The used functions are
no client, meaning, that the access of the property is not restricted by write or read access restrictions.

rows.Name: propID
rows.Comment: The ID of the property to get.
